title: Where's the new Champ Select?
body: I thought it was being released on the 13th then rescheduled for the 14th, which is today. {{item:3070}}

replies.body: I am sad. I don't even really want to play until the new champ select is back :(
Maintenance announced. Patience, my friend.
same, ive tried every que now and incurred dodges becaus ei was looking for this champ select >_>

If it helps when the actual queue is in place you choose your roles before the queue starts so you should know right away that it is online and if you only want to do the new queue just press the X on the timer

The new Champ Select was actually out this morning for a few hours.  I loved it and thought it was great.  I played two games using it.  I'm not sure what the bugs were unless it is the random kick.  It took about 6 minutes to finally get into a game as it stated that players kept leaving but we would be queed with the same team.  I'm hoping that they can figure it out and have it fixed soon but knowing them it won't be out for a while :/{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
IT'SSSS HEREEEEEE{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
Stop dodging, you don't need to dodge to check. You choose roles similar to team builder before you queue. If you're in Q it's not out yet. PS entitely brats, just wait patiently.

https://twitter.com/RiotLyte/status/687681486649032704

It's coming later today.
<3 you

like, i woke up wanting to play the new que all day, i dont even wanna play the game now.
back to googling " free games"
until que comes out

"New champ select is coming to Normal and Ranked Draft queues."

"The new champ select experience will be enabled for Normal and Ranked Draft across the world later this patch! We're starting with tests in NA and TR on January 14. If everything goes well, we'll continue to roll out new champ select in other territories over the following days."

My guess is sometime later today it will be release because they did assure us it will be out on the 14th with the new patch. WITH THAT SAID....I still feel like there is a very high chance it could take a day or two but I truly don't believe they will launch it after ranked start because that would fuck with so many peoples' games if they did that and there were a shit ton of bugs.
i stayed up all night to test the new champ select rito why you screw with me like this i wanted it sooo bbaaaad
samesies XD,

they said they will turn it on "later during patch 6.1". this can mean 2 things. we either get it next week on the 20ths cuz they fucked something else up as usual or we will get it later today as promised.

knowing how stupid riot can be im guessing we will get it next wed.
no please oh no, i need it now
You are right sir. They said 14th but it means 6 days later... it's riot.

> [{quoted}](name=Fabricio Eler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qpiTmhrM,comment-id=00060001,timestamp=2016-01-14T15:27:50.906+0000)
>
> You are right sir. They said 14th but it means 6 days later... it's riot.

"sorry! jannurary 14th was actually an error in the notes. we do not have an ETA on when the new champ select will go live"

"we hit another snag, new champ select wont go live until patch 6.2. Sorry for the inconvenience!"

ya know, cuz PBE is useless for actual testing and stuff.
Snowdown shop comes out 9 hours late...
But when does it go live? I also incurred some dodges this morning just to find it. :(

> [{quoted}](name=FVS,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qpiTmhrM,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-01-14T14:48:46.405+0000)
>
> But when does it go live? I also incurred some dodges this morning just to find it. :(

mhm
I'm confused aswell. I thought it was coming out for NA with the patch?
Did you download the new patch yet? If so, idk, Pappy Rito delays releases sometimes due to bugs and shit.

> [{quoted}](name=SomeDPFanboy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qpiTmhrM,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-14T14:07:54.662+0000)
>
> Did you download the new patch yet? If so, idk, Pappy Rito delays releases sometimes due to bugs and shit.

yeah it downloaded when i logged in this morning, went into normal draft, dodged because no dynamic. went into ranked after the 5 minute wait
luckily someone else dodged so i wouldnt get a second. I just wanna play the new que, qq
You had 1 job.
Big Concern here. I can not select chroma skins in the new champ select screen.

It's out now! I don't know if it's just me, but prepare for long queues. I selected support as my primary role, and fill as my secondary, and I'm coming up to a 30 minute wait time ...

edit: went up to 45 minutes and still nothing, no longer have time for a game. Hope you all have better luck then I did with queue times. Really wanted to try this out. :(
Its AIDS

**Ahem**
"Network Operations – 12:04 AM
The TeamBuilder, Normal Draft, and Ranked Solo/Duo queues will be down for maintenance shortly."

> [{quoted}](name=Madoka KanameSan,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qpiTmhrM,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2016-01-14T17:16:00.652+0000)
>
> **Ahem**
> "Network Operations – 12:04 AM
> The TeamBuilder, Normal Draft, and Ranked Solo/Duo queues will be down for maintenance shortly."

thats been up for HOURS
{{champion:86}} FEAR NOT! IT'S COMING!
plop
GIVE US OUR CHAMP SELECT
bump!
